diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Somatic symptom disorder (hypochondriasis), generalized anxiety disorder, and attention deficit–hyperactivity disorder.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient's history and imaging studies, along with normal physical examination and laboratory results, suggested that a physical illness was unlikely. Her predominant belief in having pancreatic cancer was misinterpreted from gastrointestinal symptoms, leading to severe impairment in functioning, which aligns with hypochondriasis. Further evaluations ruled out other physical causes, reinforcing the final diagnosis.
